dashboard.tagline: Here's what's happening with your health data
settings.title: Settings
settings.compliance.residencyDescription: Select the geographical region where your encrypted data pointers are stored. This helps comply with local data protection regulations.
settings.compliance.exportDescription: Request a complete export of all your data and metadata stored on BioVault.
ai.compliancePrompt: Analyze my provided health data summary and check for potential GDPR compliance issues a user should be aware of. For example, mention sensitive data categories and the importance of explicit consent for sharing.
ai.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI Health Assistant. I can help you understand your medical records. How can I assist you today?
